Documentation

Keep the learning simple.

Available for offline use.

Typography

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Id ipsum voluptatum omnis dolores nam provident fuga soluta enim quod necessitatibus, ducimus quia, esse voluptatem hic illo. Molestiae aut harum, laborum.

Fonts

By default Neptuno use Roboto font, we also have: pt-sans and arsenal like secondary fonts.

Roboto font

PT Sans font

Arsenal font

Ubuntu font

Bubblegum font

<p class="roboto">Roboto font</p>
<p class="pt-sans">PT Sans font</p>
<p class="arsenal">Arsenal font</p>
<p class="ubuntu">Ubuntu font</p>
<p class="bubblegum">Bubblegum font</p>

Text alignment

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Fuga illum labore sunt distinctio nobis necessitatibus laudantium aperiam ab dolor consequuntur quibusdam ea eaque veniam, numquam, pariatur odit temporibus eos inventore?

Add class="text-left" to align container text to left.

Hello, world!

Add class="text-center" to align container text to center.

Hello, world!

Add class="text-right" to align container text to right.

Hello, world!

Text transform

lowercased text.

UPPERCASED TEXT.

<p class="lowercase">lowercased text.</p> 								
<p class="uppercase">uppercased text.</>

Font style

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Pariatur similique eligendi mollitia fugit maxime in accusamus eveniet animi sit porro aspernatur necessitatibus amet esse, quisquam sed quod voluptatibus. Sunt, pariatur.

Add class="italic" to make italic text.

Hello, world!

Add class="bold" to make bold text.

Hello, world!

Add class="bolder" to make bolder text.

Hello, world!

Text color

Add class="white-text" to change text color to white.

Hello, world!

Add class="black-text" to change text color to black.

Hello, world!
